scripts.build-app: tsc -p ./apps/$npm_config_app_id && vite build apps/$npm_config_app_id && mv apps/$npm_config_app_id/dist ./dist/client/$npm_config_app_id
scripts.build-apps: npm run build-app --app-id=index && npm run build-app --app-id=wizard && npm run build-app --app-id=condottiere
scripts.build-node: tsc --project node/tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p node/tsconfig.json && mv node/dist ./dist/node
scripts.build-all: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/client && npm run build-node && npm run build-apps
scripts.local-deploy: npm run build-all && npm run start-server
